languages.text: "Тебе стоило бы бояться не злых языков, а того, кем элантах станет, если не сойдет с выбранного пути. Обычаи Темных язвят душу... и открывают тайны, которым лучше остаться неузнанными".

"It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."
languages.original_text: "Тебе стоило бы бояться не злых языков, а того, кем элантах станет, если не сойдет с выбранного пути. Обычаи Темных язвят душу... и открывают тайны, которым лучше остаться неузнанными".

traits.locale_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你该害怕并不是尖叫声，而是倘若外界人继续一意孤行，{mf|他|她}最终会变成什么样子。黑暗子嗣的道途将会逐渐蚕食{mf|他|她}的灵魂，显露出……那些最好永远不为人知的秘密。”
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: “你该害怕并不是尖叫声，而是倘若外界人继续一意孤行，{mf|他|她}最终会变成什么样子。黑暗子嗣的道途将会逐渐蚕食{mf|他|她}的灵魂，显露出……那些最好永远不为人知的秘密。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas les mauvaises langues qu'il vous faut craindre, mais ce que l'elantach deviendra {mf|s'il|si elle} ne revient pas sur le droit chemin. Les méthodes des Eldars noirs sont un poison pour l'âme... et font entrevoir des secrets qui devraient demeurer dans l'ombre. »
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas les mauvaises langues qu'il vous faut craindre, mais ce que l'elantach deviendra {mf|s'il|si elle} ne revient pas sur le droit chemin. Les méthodes des Eldars noirs sont un poison pour l'âme... et font entrevoir des secrets qui devraient demeurer dans l'ombre. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No debes temer a las lenguas afiladas, sino a lo que será de{mf|l| la} elantach si no abandona su Senda elegida. Los caminos de los Oscuros corroen el alma... y revelan secretos que es mejor olvidar en la ignorancia».
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: «No debes temer a las lenguas afiladas, sino a lo que será de{mf|l| la} elantach si no abandona su Senda elegida. Los caminos de los Oscuros corroen el alma... y revelan secretos que es mejor olvidar en la ignorancia».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが恐れるべきは、邪悪な舌ではなく、もし{|彼|彼女}が選んだ道から身を引かなければ、エランタがどうなるかってこと。闇の者たちのやり方は魂を蝕み…知られない方がいい秘密が明らかになる」
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが恐れるべきは、邪悪な舌ではなく、もし{|彼|彼女}が選んだ道から身を引かなければ、エランタがどうなるかってこと。闇の者たちのやり方は魂を蝕み…知られない方がいい秘密が明らかになる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist sind nicht die bösen Zungen, die Ihr fürchten solltet, sondern was aus dem Elantach wird, wenn er seinem gewählten Pfad nicht wieder verlässt. Die Wege der Dunklen zerfressen die Seele ... und legen Geheimnisse offen, die besser unentdeckt bleiben sollten."
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist sind nicht die bösen Zungen, die Ihr fürchten solltet, sondern was aus dem Elantach wird, wenn er seinem gewählten Pfad nicht wieder verlässt. Die Wege der Dunklen zerfressen die Seele ... und legen Geheimnisse offen, die besser unentdeckt bleiben sollten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

languages.text: "Kem sözlülerden değil, o Yoldan dönmediği takdirde elantach'ın başına geleceklerden korkun asıl. Bu Karalar'ın yolu, kişinin ruhunu tüketir... Bilinmemesi en hayırlı sırları gösterir."
languages.original_text: "It is not the wicked tongues you should fear, but what the elantach will become if {mf|he|she} does not turn aside from {mf|his|her} chosen Path. The ways of the Dark Ones eat away at the soul... and reveal secrets better left unacknowledged."

traits.locale_text: "Kem sözlülerden değil, o Yol'dan dönmediği takdirde elantach'ın başına geleceklerden korkun asıl. Bu Karalar'ın yolu, kişinin ruhunu tüketir... Bilinmemesi en hayırlı sırları gösterir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
